content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Setup at (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (41.0, -82.0)
- Storage chest (41.5, -80.5)
- Burner inserter (41.5, -79.5) connecting drill to chest

### Copper Plate Production at (-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (-28.0, -61.0) for copper ore
- Storage chest (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter (-26.5, -59.5) moving ore to furnace
- Stone furnace (-25.0, -59.0) for smelting
- Burner inserter (-23.5, -58.5) moving plates to storage
- Storage chest (-22.5, -58.5) for output

### Iron Plate Production at (-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (-18.0, -53.0) for iron ore
- Storage chest (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter (-16.5, -51.5) moving ore to furnace
- Stone furnace (-15.0, -51.0) for smelting
- Burner inserter (-13.5, -50.5) moving plates to storage
- Storage chest (-12.5, -50.5) for output

### Power Generation System at (-4.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler (-4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe groups for water and steam circulation

### Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (8.5, 13.5)
- Input chest (5.5, 13.5) for iron gear wheels
- Output chest (11.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserters (6.5, 13.5 and 10.5, 13.5) for material movement
- Lab for research
- Connected belt groups for material transport

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting non-existent items
- Check if the target container actually contains the item before attempting extraction
- Verify item counts in storage chests before extraction attempts

### Errors when inserting items without having them
- Ensure required items are in inventory before attempting insertion
- Check fuel levels and maintain adequate coal supply for burner devices

### Resource shortage issues
- Monitor and maintain continuous copper plate production
- Keep adequate fuel supply in all burner devices
- Ensure proper material flow between storage and production facilities

### Production line stoppages
- Monitor assembling machine ingredient levels
- Keep input materials stocked for continuous operation
- Maintain proper fuel levels in all burner inserters and mining drills
